subtitles:
260693 263562 You are confused, aren't you?
Frightened.
263563 265297 That's all right. I can help you.
265298 266331 Who is this?

266332 268400 I am a doctor.
Now, you must listen to me.

268401 271103 You have lost your memory.
There was an experiment.

271104 273038 Something went wrong.
Your memory was erased.
273039 274072 Do you understand me?

274073 276208 No, I don't understand.
What the hell is going on here?

276209 278777 Just listen. There are people
coming for you even as we speak.

278778 282481 You must not let them find you.
You must leave now.
282482 285246 Hello? Are you there?

344344 346845 Hey, Mr. Murdoch.
The Automat called.
346846 349748 Said you left your wallet there.

349749 353051 I suggest you retrieve it since
you only paid for 3 weeks...
353052 356242 and they was up 10 minutes ago.
357023 358657 I've been here 3 weeks?

358658 361693 It's right there in
black and white, Mr. Murdoch.
361694 363423 Day and date.

364130 367632 We make our books like we make
our beds, all neat and tidy.
367633 369501 I'll take care of it when I get back.

369502 371703 See that you do.
Only thing makes you a guest...

371704 376434 in this joint, pal,
is cash on the barrelhead.

398030 400599 House rules.
3 weeks is 3 weeks.
400600 403650 No days off for good behavior.
425358 428987 Mr. Murdoch, yes, where is he?
429028 432725 He just left not 5 minutes ago.

440039 444237 # When marimba rhythms
start to play #
444277 446336 # Dance with me #

449415 453545 # Like a lazy ocean
hugs the shore #
453586 455781 # Hold me close #

458624 462890 # Like a flower
bending in the breeze #
465364 468265 # Sway with ease #

468301 472465 # When we dance
you have a way with me #
478077 479397 Hey, sweetie!

480046 482180 He said he was your
husband's doctor.
482181 485051 He wanted to speak with you.

508107 511176 Schreber. Please,
won't you come in?
511177 513727 You must be Emma Murdoch.

514180 519117 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.
519118 520847 What is this?

521787 525857 A rather crude experiment...
designed to further my studies.
525858 527058 I don't understand.

527059 532197 You say you're my husband's doctor,
but he never mentioned you to me.
532198 533565 The truth is, Mrs. Murdoch...

533566 536067 John has been coming to
see me for quite some time.

536068 539838 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal...

539839 543008 stemming from your
marital difficulties.

543009 546244 - John told you what happened?
- Yes.

546245 548580 When was the last time
that you saw him?

550082 553885 He packed a suitcase.
He was very angry at me.

553886 556922 I understand how difficult
this must be for you.

556923 558590 But for John's sake,
I would like you...

558591 561259 to think of me
as your friend, Emma.

561260 565063 It appears that John has suffered
a psychotic break.
565064 567154 Complete memory loss.
567934 570001 He may be delusional.
570002 571902 Even violent.

574674 577876 if he were to contact you,
and I suspect he will...

577877 580779 you must call me immediately.
Do you understand?

580780 585183 It is imperative that I be
the first one to reach him.

585184 589634 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching...
602535 604436 Good evening, Mr. Murdoch.
604437 607238 It is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?

607239 611107 Mr. -was it
"J"- something-Murdoch?
615281 618773 What's your name? Justin? Jerry?

622488 624623 My name's Jason Murdoch.
John Murdoch.
624624 626091 Jake Murdoch. How's it going?
626092 627822 Hi. Jack Murdoch.

674507 677709 I told the guy,
"Cash on the barrelhead. "
677710 681212 I said, "Listen, 3 weeks is 3 weeks. "
681213 682480 Where's our lucky winner?
682481 685314 Upstairs, sir, room 614.
685351 688115 Another call girl.
691857 693625 Evening, Husselbeck.
693626 694993 Inspector Bumstead.
694994 697044 Your lace is untied.
710142 711676 Am I glad you're here, sir.

711677 714345 They say Detective Walenski's
got the heebie-jeebies.

714346 718436 Just take what they give me,
Husselbeck.

723889 730259 Wow. Looks like somebody
woke up on the wrong side of the bed.

770870 773420 - Hello.
- Oh, it's you.
773439 774873 You left your wallet here, buddy.
774874 776207 When did I do that?
776208 777375 When you was last here.

777376 780545 - When was that?
- When you left your wallet.
780546 783186 You expect me to remember?
785117 788348 Hello. Excuse me.
789288 791256 No, no, seriously.

809742 811910 - Where you headed, chief?
- Home.
811911 812977 And where's home?

812978 815780 Haven't you mugs got
anything better to do?

815781 818082 Well, I'm just trying
to do my job, May.

818083 820185 There's a killer out there
in case you hadn't noticed.

820186 826257 Maybe you should be out looking for him
instead of cooling your heels, huh?
826258 828678 Go on, get out of here.
838437 840987 Round and round she goes.
843108 847204 Where she stops? Nobody knows.

850382 853551 What's that make so far, Husselbeck?
6 hookers in all?
853552 855053 I believe so, sir.
855054 857622 Give the man an "A" for effort.

857623 859891 You'd think these stiffs
would have the good grace...
859892 863027 to expire at a good time of night.
863028 866348 Hey, too bad about Walenski, huh?
868667 871267 I guess he'd seen enough.
877309 878989 So, Husselbeck...

879745 886116 what kind of killer do you think
stops to save a dying fish?
886151 887185 You've got me, sir.
887186 889354 Bumstead, what took you?

889355 892657 This killer's been running circles
around us thanks to Walenski.

892658 894459 With all due respect,
Chief Inspector...

894460 897495 I've known Eddie a long time.
He's a good cop.

897496 901733 Whatever kind of cop Walenski once was,
he let drift a long time ago.
901734 903601 Let me talk to Bumstead!
903602 905003 Come on, let's go.
906405 908703 Frank, Frank!
910175 911342 Get his arm!
911343 912377 They're watching us!
912378 913444 On your feet.
913445 914913 There's no way out!
914914 916281 Don't make us hurt you.
916282 918382 God, can't you see?!
921387 922754 Let me go, let me go!
922755 925290 I'm not gonna hurt you. I'm not..

925291 928151 - What was that?
- Walenski.
935901 939103 I'm being punished for my sins, right?
939104 941506 What did I ever do to inherit this?
941507 942640 Where do you begin?

942641 947679 Well, everything Detective Walenski
committed to paper should be here, so..

947680 952784 The only thing that should
be committed is Walenski.
952785 956645 Nothing like a little healthy paranoia.

958657 963157 Sir, we just got
the fingerprint results in.
965164 968444 What is this, some kind of joke?
971170 973810 Don't throw anything away.
978677 980537 Inspector Bumstead.

982047 985550 I came here to file
a missing persons report for my husband.
985551 987485 Take it to the front desk.
987486 990496 They told me to come see you.
991090 993550 His name's John Murdoch.

994326 997395 Mrs. Murdoch,
why didn't you report this before?

997396 1002633 I mean, if your husband has been missing
as long as you say...

1002634 1006504 I thought he'd simply
walked out on me.

1006505 1010508 Then a... doctor contacted me
this evening.
1010509 1012176 How long have you been married?
1012177 1013997 Nearly four years.
1014580 1016445 Why do you ask?

1016482 1019617 Because you seem uncomfortable
with your ring.

1019618 1023321 As if you were...
unaccustomed to wearing it.
1023322 1025832 No, I never take it off.

1031330 1035357 Do these names
mean anything to you?
1040706 1043166 No. Who are these women?

1043509 1045910 Why are you looking
for my husband?

1045911 1047812 Are you going to accuse him
of something?
1047813 1050111 Maybe. Maybe murder.
1050149 1051469 Whose murder?

1052584 1056281 - Which one?
- All of them.

1057256 1059490 Mrs. Murdoch,
I am sorry, I'm sorry.
1059491 1060591 I didn't mean to alarm you.

1060592 1063194 I'm so sorry that I came.
Just both made a mistake.
1063195 1064695 Mrs. Murdoch, if you please.

1064696 1069706 If you'll just give me
half a second to explain...
1070469 1072389 I'll be right out.
1095627 1097925 Have we met before?

1097963 1101632 If we did...
I hope you're still breathing.
1101633 1104093 What's your name, honey?
1107039 1109707 Well, that's an appropriate name.
1116849 1118899 I was just thinking.
1125057 1128356 seems kind of dangerous...

1130429 1132196 I mean, how do you know
I'm not the killer?

1132197 1136477 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

1136602 1140922 You feeling any urges
I should know about?

1220919 1226279 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.

1228894 1232597 We might ask
the same question, yes?

1315981 1319317 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.
1319318 1321285 It is said he is able to tune.
1321286 1322651 Impossible.

1322688 1325523 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1325524 1327992 On occasion the imprinting
does not take.

1327993 1330995 They behave erratically
when they awaken.

1330996 1334665 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1334666 1336867 But this one was different, yes?

1336868 1338602 What has the doctor
to say about this?
1338603 1340638 He has failed to report in.

1340639 1343808 - And Mr. Quick?
- No more Mr. Quick.
1343809 1346801 Mr. Quick, dead, yes.
1349848 1352442 Poor, poor Mr. Quick.
1352484 1355351 Mr. Book, does he know?
1356688 1359490 Should we not know, Mr. Hand?

1359491 1362393 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1362394 1366397 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1366398 1368999 Mr. Night, you will take the East.
1369000 1371798 Mr. Face, you the West.
1371837 1373971 Mr. Glove, the South.
1373972 1376202 Mr. Shade, the North.
1377743 1380712 We must have this man.

1394359 1399930 Do you really think my husband could be
capable of committing those murders?

1403034 1407954 Let's hope, for both our sakes,
that I'm wrong.
1450215 1453405 I've been so worried about you.
1455754 1457888 Are you punishing me?

1457889 1460524 You know, if disappearing
is your way of punishing me...
1460525 1461659 I don't appreciate it.

1461660 1465760 I don't know what
you're talking about.
1466565 1469099 I found these keys in my pocket...
1469100 1471796 so I assume I live here.
1471837 1473637 You supposed to be my wife?
1473638 1475663 Supposed to be?
1480045 1483276 don't know who I am, do you?
1483315 1484548 Your doctor called me.

1484549 1486083 He was worried
that this might happen.
1490188 1492256 he gave me his card.
1492257 1494825 He's desperate to find you.

1501666 1503801 I feel like I'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1503802 1507304 What happened to me?
Why was I seeing a doctor?
1507305 1509432 I had an affair.
1510509 1512943 You were angry at me.
1515380 1517281 The police are looking for you.
1517282 1519617 I know. I saw the papers.
1519618 1523108 "Killer stalks city streetwalkers. "
1525690 1529285 I was with one of those women...
1529327 1531795 before I came here tonight.
1531796 1533497 I don't understand.
1533498 1536458 I met her outside an Automat.
1536468 1539069 I guess I wanted to test myself.

1539070 1543040 I wanted to know if I had it in me
to do those things.

1543041 1548291 Maybe I have lost my mind, but whoever
I am, I'm still me and I'm not a killer.
1553985 1555953 I believe you.

1563261 1566096 The car outside,
the one you arrived in.

1566097 1569837 It's a cop.
He dropped me off here.
1570569 1573237 I didn't know he was still here.
1575574 1578394 Hold it right there, mister!
1579711 1581712 Wait. You have the wrong man.
1581713 1582880 Stand aside, will you, please?
1582881 1584515 I didn't kill anyone.

1584516 1588552 Right now what you are
is a suspect. Turn yourself in.

1588553 1590154 I'll listen to whatever
you have to say.

1590155 1593157 You're not gonna believe
what I have to say.
1594859 1596460 There's someone after me.

1596461 1599630 There's this group of men.
They want me dead.

1599631 1603033 And I don't even know if..
They're not even..

1603034 1605302 Yeah, who's gonna
listen to a madman?
1605303 1607137 Stand aside, Mrs. Murdoch.
1612110 1614840 No one ever listens to me.
1620385 1621795 Murdoch, stop!
1664162 1665195 How much further?
1665196 1667836 We're almost there, buddy.

1669434 1672770 Hey, you happen to know
the way to Shell Beach?

1672771 1675706 You're kidding. Me and the missus
spent our honeymoon there.

1675707 1680397 All you gotta do is take
Main Street west to..
1681279 1683013 Or is it the cross..

1683014 1686684 You know, that's funny.
I can't seem to remember...

1686685 1691195 if it's Main Street west
or the cross-town.

1693658 1697227 I'm sorry, Inspector,
I cannot be of more assistance...

1697228 1699129 but I am running late
for an appointment.

1699130 1703220 Well, I appreciate
your taking the time.

1709641 1711975 There's just one thing
that puzzles me.

1711976 1716680 I've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.
1716681 1719383 Murdoch doesn't strike me as one.

1719384 1723087 Perhaps you are not
accustomed to digging deep enough.

1723088 1725656 Well, I do know when someone
is lying to me, Doctor.

1725657 1728325 Forgive me, Inspector,
but you are not a clinician.

1728326 1732096 Judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1732097 1734164 Well, maybe you could
give me a few pointers.
1736034 1738102 Let's take you, for instance.
1738103 1741470 You are a fastidious man, driven.
1741506 1743565 Consumed by details.
1744342 1747122 I would say your life is...
1747545 1748955 rather lonely.

1749347 1754207 Good evening, Inspector.
I really must be going.

1793291 1797625 Closing time.
The pool is now closed.

1807172 1812743 Most unfortunate it is that we were
forced to seek you out here.

1812744 1816113 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this...

1817816 1821018 - I'm sorry. I..
- Failed to report in, yes.

1821019 1823687 I was frightened.
I have a weak heart, you know.

1823688 1827591 Your weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart.

1827592 1830294 We found this
in his hotel room.

1830295 1834264 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?
1834265 1835365 I tried to imprint him...

1835366 1837534 but he woke up, he knocked the syringe
right out of my hand.
1837535 1839670 I tried to stop him but he was too fast.
1839671 1840871 He has no memories, then?

1840872 1844274 Only fragments.
The procedure, it was interrupted.

1844275 1848111 I guess it's only a matter
of rounding him up.

1848112 1849713 You have had strays
before, right?

1849714 1853784 This is no stray, Doctor.
This one can tune.

1853785 1856620 But that's impossible.
I thought only you had that ability.

1856621 1860958 You will process another template
of the subject's memories, yes?
1860959 1862726 Of course. I'll imprint him again.

1862727 1867817 No. We require them
for a quite different purpose.

1868066 1870567 It's almost midnight,
Dr. Schreber.

1870568 1873570 We'll talk again
after tonight's tuning, but...
1873571 1875405 no more delays, yes?

1875406 1880207 No more inconsistencies
in your behavior.
1887719 1890809 You appear quite frail, Doctor.

1891356 1895446 Perhaps some exercise
would do you good.

1914746 1917296 - How is he?
- The same.
1917782 1920376 Walenski? It's me, Frank.
1926724 1928274 Come in, Frank.
1931095 1932995 Close the door.

1940438 1943840 I've been looking through
some of your old reports.
1943841 1946391 It's an interesting case.

1947045 1951880 The kind that can make
a man's career...
1953151 1955519 Yeah, I was on that case.

1955520 1959786 And then what?
What happened then, Eddie?
1959824 1961692 Nothing happened, Frank.

1961693 1965862 I've just been spending time
on the subway, riding in circles.
1965863 1967863 Thinking in circles.
1968666 1970676 There's no way out.

1971569 1975669 I've been over every inch
of this city.

1978176 1980577 You're scaring your wife
to death, Eddie.
1980578 1982498 She's not my wife.

1983781 1986783 I don't know who she is.
I don't know who any of us are.
1986784 1988752 What makes you say that?

1988753 1992289 Do you think about
the past much, Frank?
1992290 1994358 As much as the next guy.

1994359 1997527 See, I've been trying
to remember things..

1997528 2000263 clearly remember things
from my past.

2000264 2005736 But the more I try to think back,
the more it all starts to unravel.
2005737 2007104 None of it seems real.

2007105 2010507 It's like I've just been
dreaming this life...

2010508 2014111 and when I finally wake up
I'll be somebody else.
2014112 2016742 Somebody totally different.

2020685 2023420 You saw something,
didn't you, Eddie?
2023421 2026471 Something to do with the case.

2027025 2030527 There is no case.
There never was!

2030528 2034965 It's all just a big joke!
It's a joke!
2075440 2078241 Tonight's requirements are...

2078242 2083009 12 family photo albums,
9 personal diaries...

2083047 2087987 17 love letters,
assorted childhood photographs...

2088019 2092155 26 wallets,
ID's and social security cards.
2092156 2095066 These do bring back memories.
2096627 2098895 This one is still warm.
2100731 2103967 The recollections of a great lover?
2103968 2106994 A catalog of conquests?
2107038 2109318 We will soon find out.

2109907 2114578 You wouldn't appreciate that,
would you, Mr. Whatever your name is?

2114579 2119849 Not the sort of conquests
you would ever understand.
2122253 2125163 A touch of unhappy childhood.
2130795 2133615 A dash of teenage rebellion.
2135266 2138064 And last, but not least...
2138102 2140403 a tragic death in the family.

2152116 2155819 Why does Murdoch not sleep
during the tuning as the others do?

2155820 2159990 I don't know. Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.

2159991 2162893 A freak of nature.
He's adapting to survive.

2162894 2166329 What do you expect?
Weren't you looking for the human soul?

2166330 2168932 That's the purpose
of your little zoo, isn't it?

2168933 2172302 That's why you keep changing people
and things around every night.

2172303 2175438 Maybe you have finally found
what you are looking for...

2175439 2179179 and it's going
to bite you on your..

2180611 2184281 It requires several of your lifetimes
to master our gifts.

2184282 2188185 The idea that a simple man
could develop the ability to tune..
2188186 2189753 Is absurd, I know...

2189754 2193434 but what other
explanation is there?
2243774 2245144 Shut it down.
2260791 2263431 Get your paper right here!
2273671 2275438 It's driving me crazy.
2276907 2278742 And they call my job "unskilled".
2278743 2280076 You think you've got it tough?

2280077 2282846 You try looking after these kids,
for a change.

2282847 2287517 Anyways, Frederickson says he'll
take me off the damn night shift soon.
2287518 2290388 Well, it's about time, dear.
2390621 2392761 Can anybody hear me?!
2395760 2399218 Let the tuning commence.

2558822 2561891 The Goodwins.
Jeremy, Sylvia...
2561892 2564302 Jane and little Matthew.
2567998 2570408 Jane and little Matthew.
2600197 2602859 The rich get richer.

2602900 2608760 Probably have maid's quarters
before the night is through.
2659757 2662091 Dr. Schreber, I presume.

2664561 2666796 That's no way to greet
a patient, Doctor.

2666797 2668598 If that's what you are,
huh, Doctor?
2668599 2670033 Mr. Murdoch, please, I..

2670034 2671934 What is happening here?
Why is everyone asleep?
2671935 2674337 Shh. Please keep your voice down.

2674338 2676305 Why can't I remember anything?
What have you done to me?

2676306 2679108 Nothing, nothing.
Please, I want to help you.
2679109 2680443 We can't talk here.

2680444 2682679 It is not safe.
If they see us together, they'll..

2682680 2684147 I don't care.
I want some answers.
2684148 2685515 I want some answers now!
2685516 2686716 Who are they?
2686717 2688685 Why are they trying to kill me?
2695092 2698255 My God. You really can do it.

2699630 2701898 Listen to me, John.
You have their power.

2701899 2704033 You can make things happen
by will alone.

2704034 2707370 They call it tuning. That is how
they make the buildings change.

2707371 2709972 Just now you acted out
of self-defense. A reflex.

2709973 2712842 But I can teach you to control
your power consciously.

2712843 2715211 Let me help you, John.
Together we can stop them.
2715212 2717902 We can take the city back.
2723320 2725254 My glasses, please.

2772369 2775071 He made a terrible
impression for the firm...
2775072 2777440 lollygagging around as he did.

2777441 2780376 So I simply told Frederickson
I was going to have to let him go.
2780377 2783412 And well you should have, darling.
2783413 2784963 He attacked me.
2785749 2788084 I don't know where he has gone.
2788085 2789995 Come, Dr. Schreber.
2790988 2792622 We have much to do.

2811108 2818708 # They say that you're
a run-around lover #
2818749 2822651 # Though you say #

2829760 2835528 # But if you put me down
for another #
2840137 2844574 # Believe me, I'll know #
2846276 2850144 # 'Cause the night #
2850180 2854116 # Has a thousand eyes #
2855018 2858954 # And a thousand eyes #
2858989 2862254 # Can't tell, but see #
2864628 2871192 # If you are true to me #
2877007 2882707 # When you tell those little white lies #

2882746 2893179 # That the night
has a thousand eyes #
2896293 2900627 # A thousand eyes #

2907304 2910873 Tonight's experiment shall be conducted
in the following locations.

2910874 2915311 The first subject
shall be imprinted here on Avenue M.
2915312 2917880 Mr. Book. There is a problem.

2917881 2921250 There is no Avenue M.
We were unable to complete it.

2921251 2925021 During the last tuning
we detected a lack of control.

2925022 2927723 An opposing influence
on the machines?

2927724 2932495 Then this man Murdoch
is more powerful than we thought.
2932496 2934297 He's becoming like us.
2934298 2938860 So we must become like him.

2938902 2941370 The good doctor
has done as we asked?

2941371 2946011 The life and times
of John Murdoch, Volume 2.
2947010 2949342 We must not do this.

2949379 2952949 Murdoch does not possess
these memories, yes?

2952950 2955651 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?
2955652 2957984 Everywhere he goes...

2958021 2960690 everyone he seeks out
will be known to us.

2960691 2965728 And as he follows the clues,
so shall we follow the memories.

2965729 2968431 Perhaps we have forgotten
what happened last time, when we t..
2968432 2971560 Yes. Poor, poor Mr. ..
2971601 2973502 We have not forgotten.

2973503 2980773 If Mr. Hand wishes to make this
sacrifice for the greater good...

2982879 2988117 But to imprint one of us.
Failure has always resulted.

2988118 2991687 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
2998795 3000985 This may sting a bit.
3043507 3047034 I have John Murdoch... in mind.

3053750 3057253 "I found this postcard
among your mother's things."

3057254 3059422 "Brings back memories,
doesn't it?"
3059423 3061288 "Stop by sometime."

3061324 3063159 "We'll see if we
can't hook ourselves..."
3063160 3064527 "another mermaid."
3064528 3066758 "Love to Emma. Karl. "
3075205 3076934 Karl Harris.

3094624 3097526 Excuse me. Can you tell
me the way to Avenue C?
3097527 3099077 Try the subway.
3102732 3104333 You got a problem, pal?
3104334 3107269 You been working here long?

3108338 3112478 25 years. No days off
for good behavior.
3136766 3139929 We're looking for John Murdoch.
3173904 3176038 She knows nothing, Mr. Hand.
3176039 3178207 A dead end, yes, Mr. Wall.

3178208 3180843 We thought his imprint would
allow us to track him, yes...

3180844 3183312 but instead we have
been brought here.
3183313 3184980 This is irrational.
3184981 3187349 Instincts are irrational, Mr. Wall...

3187350 3190819 and we must follow
where they lead, yes.

3190820 3195357 Mr. Sleep suggests he may go
to places familiar... his job.
3195358 3197459 He does not care about our job.
3197460 3200293 Indulge us, Mr. Hand.
3200330 3201997 If you were Murdoch..
3205001 3206731 I were Murdoch...
3208205 3210115 I would remember...

3210140 3215277 how my wife had hurt me

3218481 3223221 I would look for a way

3225655 3228057 Leave me alone with her.
3228058 3230568 There's work to be done.

3258221 3260181 That's the Express.

3269132 3270933 The one they've been looking for.

3273470 3276338 At least, in this life, I was.

3283580 3285714 till no one knows

3302565 3304665 I figured a way out.
3315445 3316995 They were here.
3319983 3322493 This was to be his home.
3325021 3326922 That was when we loved her.

3338501 3341511 And I know where to find her.

3365662 3368290 alien to yours...

3378708 3381938 no experiences to call your own.

3392422 3394788 Something... better.

3401564 3403365 Biggest thing you ever saw.

3410039 3411909 on this very spot.

3419416 3422336 I met my wife at this place.

3700163 3704123 Stay here.

3787950 3791860 The inspector is gonna take me. Thanks.
3815511 3817061 It's beautiful.

3834297 3836498 It's a funny thing, though.

3869098 3870832 even if it is for just a night.

4080709 4084579 different eras, different pasts

4087116 4088650 in order to learn.
4090086 4091586 About you, Mr. Murdoch...
4091587 4093888 you and your fellow inhabitants...

4284813 4286347 I am not telling you lies!

4290919 4293955 and every time I try to rearrange the

4331860 4334910 I just mean... during the day.

4336231 4337832 When was the last time

4337833 4341636 And I'm not talking about some distant,

4353349 4356045 exists... in this place.

4368263 4369864 They're doing something to all of us.

4396058 4397389 Explain this.

4424219 4426421 I wish I could take it all back.
4426422 4428990 No. Emma... You didn't do it.

4431794 4433461 the thing you're

4433462 4435363 you didn't do it.

4448477 4451427 and everything you remember...

4454316 4458186 Someone just wants us to think it did.
4462090 4465259 You know, back in the apartment...

4465260 4469497 I suddenly felt like

4469498 4472918 It was as if you were a stranger.

4476605 4480735 I so vividly remember meeting you.
4480776 4484416 I remember falling in love with you.
4484646 4486814 I remember losing you.
4492888 4495028 just one more minute.
4500496 4502623 I love you, John.
4505467 4509017 You can't fake something like that.

4628290 4631088 Take us to Murdoch.
4662391 4664291 I knew you'd come eventually.

4666928 4669123 Yes. Yes, of course.
4669164 4671854 Won't you please sit down?

4678573 4682713 You see,

4683111 4685613 One could almost call it a phobia.

4690519 4692620 Well, for now, let's just say...

4692621 4695356 that you were the subject

4699027 4701397 You're not crazy, John.
4701730 4704510 And you are not a murderer.

4708770 4711439 and I cannot afford the luxury

4711440 4713007 Everything you need to know...

4713008 4715376 all the answers

4715377 4716610 I need you to inject yourself.

4742904 4746740 All the answers you've been

4752881 4754115 If you don't mind.

4783478 4786480 None of these maps extend far enough

4786481 4787915 You won't find anything there...

4793555 4796015 We'll see for ourselves.

4813375 4815785 You were saying, doctor?

4840569 4842002 Just don't hurt me.

4842003 4845323 It doesn't matter anymore anyway.
4854883 4857181 Who are you people?

4861356 4866327 We will give you some more

4869397 4871677 You will be soon, yes.
4875370 4878740 I have another use for her first.

4884980 4890779 First there was darkness.

4892354 4895923 They abducted us

4895924 4898726 This city, everyone in it...
4898727 4900127 is their experiment.

4900128 4903063 They mix and match
our memories as they see fit...

4903064 4906533 trying to divine
what makes us unique.

4906534 4909336 One day, a man
might be an inspector.
4909337 4912273 The next, someone entirely different.

4912274 4915609 When they want to
study a murderer for instance...

4915610 4920547 they simply imprint one of their
citizens with a new personality...

4920548 4925386 arrange a family for him,
friends, an entire history...
4925387 4927021 even a lost wallet.
4927022 4930022 Then they observe the results.

4930125 4934261 Will a man, given the history

4934262 4938299 Or are we, in fact, more
than the mere sum of our memories?

4938300 4943337 This business of you being a killer

4943338 4946240 You have had dozens
of lives before now.

4946241 4950344 You just happened to wake up while
I was imprinting you with this one.
4950345 4952513 Why are they doing all of this?
4952514 4955950 It is our capacity for individuality...

4955951 4958552 our souls that makes
us different from them.

4958553 4960955 They think they
can find the human soul...

4960956 4964124 if they understand
how our memories work.

4964125 4965426 All they have
are collective memories.
4965427 4968260 They share one group mind.
4968296 4969797 They're dying, you see?

4969798 4973267 Their entire race
is on the brink of extinction.
4973268 4975169 They think we can save them.

4975170 4978238 - Where do I fit in?
- You are different, John.

4978239 4982239 You resisted my attempt
to imprint you.

4985714 4989149 Somehow you have developed
their ability to tune.

4989150 4992052 That is how they change things.

4992053 4995289 They have machines buried deep
beneath the surface...

4995290 4999793 that allow them
to focus their telepathic energies.

4999794 5002329 They control everything here,

5002330 5005699 That's why it's always dark.

5005700 5007001 So why do they need you?

5007002 5011438 When they first brought us here,

5011439 5015309 So they could store the information,

5015310 5017878 and give us back new memories

5017879 5022519 But they still needed an artist

5023351 5026553 I understood the intricacies

5026554 5029123 better than they ever could...

5029124 5031892 so they allowed me

5031893 5033360 because they needed them.

5033361 5037451 But they made me

5044205 5047074 Can you imagine what

5047075 5048842 to erase your own past?

5048843 5053080 What about my past?

5053081 5055777 Shell Beach, Uncle Karl.
5056551 5058191 What about this?
5058753 5060687 This was blank when I found it!
5060688 5062756 You still don't understand, John.

5062757 5065993 You were never a boy...

5065994 5068829 Your entire history is an illusion,

5068830 5070731 as it is with all of us.

5070732 5073267 You made those drawings

5073268 5076228 You say they brought us here.
5084079 5085859 I don't remember.
5085880 5088315 None of us remember that...
5088316 5089950 what we once were...
5089951 5092419 what we might have been...
5092420 5093920 somewhere else.
5111272 5113273 I've taken you this far.
5113274 5115442 You don't need me anymore.
5161356 5164154 There is no ocean, John.
5164192 5168322 There is nothing beyond the city.
5168363 5171696 The only place home exists...
5173535 5175526 is in your head.
5222584 5225364 And now you know the truth.

5293388 5296323 You'll allow yourself

5296324 5298592 or it will result in

5298593 5302329 What do I care? She's not my

5302330 5309303 But you do still care, don't you, Mr. Murdoch?

5309304 5311764 you were intended to be.

5313107 5317617 Shall I end her life now

5320048 5322316 Don't hurt her, please!
5322317 5326947 Then surrender, Mr. Murdoch.

5374235 5377437 The doctor was right.

5379006 5381056 Kill him!

5384779 5387509 Kill him! Kill him!
5390184 5392709 He is powerful, yes.

5392754 5397257 Dangerous. But he can also

5397258 5400659 What the doctor calls the soul.

5400695 5404431 It is time for our experiment

5404432 5407200 We no longer need

5407201 5410830 The time for study is over.

5410872 5415070 It is time to be one

5421749 5423617 It is time, Doctor.

5430758 5433921 Shut it down forever!
5447809 5450073 What are you doing?

5455983 5462493 They want to make you one of them,

5466260 5469128 Imprint, Doctor.

5469129 5473868 I'm sorry, John.

5485012 5486912 Remember, John.

5487582 5489983 You'll rise to greater

5489984 5493119 One day when you're older,

5495556 5498458 That's it, John.

5498459 5501995 Now remember what I told you.

5501996 5503493 John, remember.

5503531 5506633 You're probably wondering why I keep

5506634 5509002 It is because I have

5509003 5511537 All of these memories

5511538 5513273 to teach you about the strangers.

5513274 5517084 Give you a lifetime of knowledge

5518846 5521212 You will survive, John.

5521249 5523583 You will find strength

5523584 5525585 and you will prevail.

5527722 5530645 - Hi, Uncle Karl.

5532760 5534895 You're getting the hang of it, John.

5534896 5537764 Maybe one day

5537765 5541534 This is the machine the strangers use

5541535 5544938 The machine that changes their

5544939 5546706 You must make the machine yours.
5546707 5548775 I know you can beat them, John.
5548776 5551376 But you must concentrate.
5553080 5555300 Something's wrong.
5562823 5565592 There is no time for romance, John.
5565593 5567961 The world can be what you make it.

5572600 5574790 but you must act now!
5858986 5860486 I knew you could do it, John.
5860487 5862555 You have their power now.
5862556 5864457 You control their machines.
5866594 5869462 She is not Emma anymore, John.

5893120 5896489 Make this world anything

6111138 6112605 how you feel.

6230424 6232794 It's so beautiful here.

6247908 6251418 I think that's it just over there.

6290651 6292118 John Murdoch.
